lines.text: I was just the stalker's apprentice

[narrating as he is found guilty of a murder he hadn't commited]
Kranze was pleased as punch... because he was the stalker... and I was still... the apprentice

[on Helmut]
It took us three weeks to prove it was him... by then he had killed three more people

[when Marcus properly meets him]
What? You were expecting me to sound like some Nazi?

[reading from his book]
I found away to stop myself... that's why I was never caught
Just like you were at home asleep when Darren and Heather were murdered
